"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557200c46368727082050800#post_557200c46368727082050800
Again i'm not saying they have to, if you legitimately believe it would harm the story or character to make a change don't do it, but if it won't and it may yield something new or interesting why not?

EXAMPLE!

Original draft for Sebastian Hot blooded Scotsman with a great sword, Very Stereotypical,

After Modifying do to my personal rules A calm collected but haughty and temperamental Scotsman who fights using a rapier,

See? no harm done and now the character is distinctive and not bound by cliches,

topics.body:
Thanotos; I've going to break rule 0 here and tell you: your movement is fucking dying; if you didn't think it was dying would you be trying to evangelize *THIS HARD* to people that you know are anti your ideology?

The reason why your movement is dying is that it's internal culture is that of a fad movement; what I mean by this is that it relies heavily on names rather than ideology.  Essentially that whoever is in the top circle decides where the movement goes.  The problem with these sorts of movements is that for the most part they are comprised primarily of younger generations of people and that if you have movements comprised primarily of younger generations of people then they lose interest much faster than older generations of people; essentially if you have a movement of people primarily under the age of 25 they tend to quit within a couple years and only a few of them stay for long.

I think you know your movement is dying cause otherwise you wouldn't be running recruitment in a forum that hates your ideology; your latest attempts at trying to get people to join your movement is about as desperate as a republican trying to get democrats in the democratic national convention to vote republican.  The reason why your movement is dying is because it's no longer receiving new recruits in enough numbers for a long term stable membership.

Your ideology is going to be dead in ten years cause everybody hates your ideology.
"In 2013 23% of americans considered themselves feminists":https://today.yougov.com/news/2013/05/01/has-feminist-become-dirty-word/
"In 2015 only 18%":http://www.vox.com/2015/4/8/8372417/feminist-gender-equality-poll

The math is pretty simple here:
(23-18)/2=2.5% of the general population per year less call themselves that; 18%/2.5% per year = 7.2 years

You *KNOW* that it's dying cause if you honestly didn't think it was then you wouldn't be trying this fucking hard to try to get people that you know hate it to join your little group.

Tl:dr; *NOBODY* here is interested; either shut up or fuck off cause everyone is fucking tired about you making every last thread about you trying to get people to join your cult.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
